title: App Farm Introduces New Game Development Platform
text:
October 08, 2015 at 02:09 AM EDT App Farm Introduces New Game Development Platform FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE LOS ANGELES, OCT. 8, 2015—App Farm and its Finnish partners today announced the release of its revolutionary web service for game development called Drobbits. Drobbits is the first ever fully browser based game development software with easy to use drag and drop interface and multi-platform publishing support. Make games with no extra software, and with any device including modern web browser. 
This browser-based game creator will allow anybody to create unique, multi-platformmobile and desktop games with no coding skills required. The service also allows users to publish games directly to the most popular app stores, including iTunes, Google Play and Windows 10. 
Drobbits works by dragging and dropping “bits” to create games. Drobbits’ user interface is fully customizable, and therefore anyone from small children to advanced web developers will find the platform easy to use. 
“The game industry is growing year by year. And given the recent success of games like Clash of Clans and Angry Birds, entrepreneurs and developers are all over creating games to make money,” said Brad Listermann, CEO and founder of App Farm. “We wanted to bring the game business to everyone. Now, stay-at-home moms and 13-year-old kids alike will be able to turn their game ideas into reality and have the opportunity to capitalize on it.” 
App Farm is a subsidiary of WorldFlix ( OTC PINK: WRFX ), an entertainment management firm based in Palm Springs, Calif. Founded in 2015, App Farm acquires profitable apps through direct purchase and by hosting contests to find the most promising up-and-coming game apps. 
Listermann said, “This could truly change the independent game development. No other software in the industry can accomplish this—or come close in my opinion. This is truly the next level.” 
Users who are interested may take a sneak peek by visiting drobbits.com and entering the password: PREVIEW 
For more information about App Farm visit www.theappfarm.co . For more information about WorldFlix visit www.worldflix.co .
